refnamediv.refpurpose: Labels the vertices of the indicated objects with their coordinate values in the MGED display window.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Labels the vertices of the indicated objects with their coordinate values in the MGED display window. The objects must have already been displayed using e, E, ev, B, or any other command that results in the display of an object.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the labelvert command to label the vertices of a designated shape with their coordinate values.

example.title: Label the vertices of a particular shape with their coordinate values.

listitem.para: Places coordinate values in the display near the vertices of shapeb .
